name: Nightingale: Horizon
description:
Welcome to Nightingale: Horizon, your the commander left in charge of your Wounded ship after you were sucked through an unstable wormhole to the other end of space. Fight ships, loot wrecks, and build the jump gate to get yourself home! this is a fast paced action packed card game by Nightingale Studios.

-=THIS GAME IS STILL IN ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT=-
